General.Name: People's Garment Public Company Limited
General.Description: People's Garment Public Company Limited manufactures and sells ready-to-wear garments in Thailand. The company offers men's and women's wear, swimwear, sportswear, men's underwear, and uniforms under the ARROW, LACOSTE, ELLE, and BSC brands; knitted fabrics and functional textiles; and medical textile products, such as fabric masks and personal protective suits. The company also exports its products to Asia, the United States, and European. People's Garment Public Company Limited was founded in 1980 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.
